com.siperian.sif.message.metadata

Class MetaDataCleanseFunction

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.siperian.sif.message.metadata.MetaDataBase
      • com.siperian.sif.message.metadata.MetaDataCleanseFunction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Comparable

    public class MetaDataCleanseFunction
extends MetaDataBase
    Represents properties of a cleanse function from the Siperian repository.
    See Also:
    DescribeSiperianObjectRequest, Serialized Form

    API Group: Metadata
